recipe.name: Grilled Cheese

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Preheat frying pan over medium heat.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Generously butter one side of both slices of bread.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: Place one slice of bread butter side down on the frying pan. Place slice of cheese on top of the bread. Add the second buttered slice of bread with the buttered side up.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: Allow sandwich to grill until bottom reaches desired browning - typically golden browned. Once browned, use spatula to flip sandwich to grill the other side. Allow sandwich to grill until cheese is melted and the bottom has reached desired browning.

steps.name: Step Five
steps.description: Use spatula to remove sandwich from pan and place onto plate. Remove pan from the burner and be sure to turn off the stovetop. Cut sandwich in half and enjoy by itself or with a dip such as ketchup.

recipe.variations: Try using different kinds of bread and different cheeses next time you make grilled cheese!

recipe.name: Boxed Mac and Cheese

ingredients.name: Package of Macaroni and Cheese Dinner

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Bring water to a boil in medium pot.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Set cheese packet aside. Add Macaroni, and cook 7 to 8 minutes until tender.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: Turn off stovetop and remove pot from heat. Strain the macaroni and return to original pot.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: Add margarine, milk, and cheese mix. Mix well. Scoop into a bowl to serve.

recipe.variations: Try serving with ketchup or your favorite hot sauce!

recipe.name: Instant Ramen

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Heat 2 cups of water to a boil in the sauce pan.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Put ramen noodles in the boiling water.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: After 3 minutes of cooking, remove the sauce pan from heat and drain excess water. Leave a little water to help mix the seasoning.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: Open seasoning packet and put in a bowl with noodles. Stir in the seasoning.

steps.name: Step Five
steps.description: Be sure to turn off the stovetop.

recipe.variations: Try frying up an over easy egg with a slab of cheese on and mix it in with the noodles for more flavour and protein!

recipe.name: Bacon

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Start with a cold pan. Bacon should be started in a cold pan, so before you turn on the heat, lay out your strips on the pan.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Cook bacon slowly on low heat.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: Pour off grease carefully.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: Cook until the bacon is done on both sides. Handle bacon with tongs.

steps.name: Step Five
steps.description: Let the cooked bacon drain.

steps.name: Step Six
steps.description: Cook the remaining bacon in batches.

recipe.variations: Try serving bacon with other brakfast food!

recipe.name: Chicken Fingers and Fries

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Preheat oven to 375 farenheit.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Arrange desired amount of chicken fingers and fries in a single layer on the ungreased baking sheet.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: The oven will beep when it has reached the appropriate temperature. Open the oven door carefully, keeping your head back to avoid the hot air which will come out. Place the baking sheet on the middle rack and close the oven door. Set a timer for 12 minutes.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: After the 12 minutes are up, put on oven mitts and remove the baking sheet from the oven. Use a spatula to flip the chicken fingers and fries. Carefully put the baking sheet back onto te middle rack, setting a timer for an additional 16 minutes.

steps.name: Step Five
steps.description: Remove baking sheet from oven using oven mitts after the 16 minutes is up. You may want to bake them for an additional couple minutes, depending on the level of crispiness you desire. Turn off the oven, and serve the chicken and fries using the spatula.

recipe.variations: Try plum sauce with your chicken fingers!

recipe.name: Mashed Potatoes

ingredients.name: Salt and Pepper - as much as desired to enhance flavor

tools.name: Pot (with salted water that can hold the potatoes)

steps.name: Step One
steps.description: Wash, peel, and cut the potatoes into quarters.

steps.name: Step Two
steps.description: Put the potatoes in the pot on the stove to boil for about 15 minutes until they are tender.

steps.name: Step Three
steps.description: Drain the pot carefully. Put potatoes in bowl.

steps.name: Step Four
steps.description: Mash potatoes thoroughly, mix gentler with milk and butter until it has an even consistency.

steps.name: Step Five
steps.description: Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.variations: Try serving mashed potatoes with gravy and steamed vegetables!
